FuncDef:
The snmp-agent remote-engineid command is used to create a remote engine ID for a remote SNMPv3 user.
The undo snmp-agent remote-engineid command is used to delete a remote engine ID. The snmp-agent remote-engineid command is used to create a remote engine ID for a remote SNMPv3 user. The undo snmp-agent remote-engineid command is used to delete a remote engine ID. By default, no remote engine ID is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the remote engine Id.
The value ranges from 10 to 64, in hexadecimal notation.

ExtraInfo: This command can create a remote engine ID, which can be associated with a remote SNMPv3 user.
